sentences.en: "How do you know he's Irish?" —"Sticks out a mile."
sentences.cn: “你是怎么知道他是爱尔兰人的呢？”——“明摆的事嘛。”

sentences.en: 170-mile-an-hour winds were clocked on a mountaintop in North Carolina.
sentences.cn: 在北卡罗来纳州一处山顶测得的风速为每小时170英里。

sentences.en: A 25 mile traffic jam clogged the northbound carriageway of the M6.
sentences.cn: 长达25英里的交通拥堵阻塞了M6号高速公路的北行车道。

sentences.en: A one-mile area around the wreck is still off limits.
sentences.cn: 沉船方圆一英里内仍然禁止进入。

sentences.en: After a six-mile run, Jackie returns home for a substantial breakfast.
sentences.cn: 跑了6英里之后，杰姬回家吃了一顿丰盛的早餐。

sentences.en: an area 50 miles wide and 150 miles long
sentences.cn: 一片50英里宽、150英里长的地区

sentences.en: He closed his door and started the quarter-mile walk down the hill.
sentences.cn: 他关上门,踏上了1/4英里长的下山路.

sentences.en: he talks a mile a minute.
sentences.cn: 他说话像连珠炮。

sentences.en: He was driving at 70 miles per hour .
sentences.cn: 他正以每小时70英里的速度驾车行驶。

sentences.en: I'm very squeamish and when I see needles I run a mile.
sentences.cn: 我神经非常脆弱，见到针头就会逃之夭夭。

sentences.en: if someone proposed to me I'd probably run a mile.
sentences.cn: 假如有人向我求婚，我可能会逃之夭夭的。

sentences.en: It was only a three-mile walk to Kabul from there.
sentences.cn: 从那里到喀布尔只需走上3英里。

sentences.en: It’s 40 miles from here to the Polish border.
sentences.cn: 从这里到波兰边界有40英里。

sentences.en: Nigel has searched for work in a ten-mile radius around his home.
sentences.cn: 奈杰尔一直在他家周围10英里的范围内找工作。

sentences.en: she &B{joined the mile-high club} by making love on a flight between New York and LA.
sentences.cn: 她在纽约飞往洛杉矶的航班上做爱，加入了高空俱乐部。

sentences.en: the baddies can be spotted a mile off.
sentences.cn: 坏蛋很容易辨认。

sentences.en: The nearer of the two barges was perhaps a mile away.
sentences.cn: 两艘驳船中较近的那艘可能有一英里远.

sentences.en: The President is determined "to go the extra mile for peace".
sentences.cn: 总统决心“为实现和平而加倍努力”。

sentences.en: The train operates the 2,400-mile round trip once a week.
sentences.cn: 这趟火车每周一次往返行驶2,400英里。

sentences.en: There is a 2 mile coastal walk from Craster to Newton.
sentences.cn: 从克拉斯特到牛顿有一条两英里的海滨小径。

sentences.en: There is a strong west-going tide, even one mile offshore.
sentences.cn: 甚至近海1英里处就有向西涌动的汹涌潮水。

sentences.en: They lived in a little cottage miles from anywhere (= a long way from the nearest town ) .
sentences.cn: 他们住在很偏僻的一间小屋里。

sentences.en: We walked about half a mile .
sentences.cn: 我们大约走了半英里。

sentences.en: Yasmin admits she would run a mile if Mark asked her out.
sentences.cn: 亚丝明承认如果马克约她出去的话，她会极力躲避。

words.tran_cn: 参加一英里赛跑的运动员

phrases.tran_cn: （死刑犯从牢房走到刑场的）最后路程
相隔千里，千里之外；心不在焉
(非正式)（表示害怕或不愿做某事）赶快避开，飞快跑掉

phrases.phrase: see (或 tell, spot) something a mile off

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)显而易见，一目了然；格格不入
(幽默)高空俱乐部（指在飞机上做爱）
三里岛（美国宾夕法尼亚州米德尔敦附近一岛，该地核电站曾发生灾难性事故）

trans.tran_cn: 英里，很远的距离，一英里赛跑
trans.tran_en: a unit for measuring distance, equal to 1,760  yard s  or about 1,609 metres
